spec_data.Name: libsigrok
spec_data.Description:
libsigrok is a shared library written in C which provides the basic API
for talking to hardware and reading/writing the acquired data into various
input/output file formats.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 01:28:44 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Basic hardware access drivers for logic analyzers
